requirements.title: Project Discovery System
requirements.description: Scan filesystem to discover projects by detecting git repositories, package.json, Cargo.toml, go.mod, and other project indicators with configurable depth limits
requirements.validation_method: Scanner finds test projects at various depths and returns accurate project metadata

requirements.title: Documentation Generator
requirements.description: Generate Vrooli integration documentation (VROOLI_INTEGRATION.md) containing scenario catalog, CLI commands, and usage examples
requirements.validation_method: Generated documentation contains correct Vrooli references and project-specific guidance

requirements.title: CLAUDE.md Injection
requirements.description: Create or update CLAUDE.md files in external projects to reference Vrooli documentation and capabilities
requirements.validation_method: CLAUDE.md files created/updated with Vrooli references without overwriting existing content

requirements.title: Integration Tracking
requirements.description: Track integration status (active/outdated/missing), last update timestamps, and Vrooli version for each project
requirements.validation_method: Status accurately reflects project state and timestamps update on integration changes

requirements.title: CLI Interface
requirements.description: Provide CLI commands for scan, integrate, list, update, and status operations with proper help text and flags
requirements.validation_method: All CLI commands execute successfully with proper output and error handling

requirements.title: Project Registry
requirements.description: Store project metadata in PostgreSQL including path, type, status, version, and integration history
requirements.validation_method: Project data persists across restarts and queries execute within 50ms

requirements.title: Project Type Detection
requirements.description: Auto-detect project type (npm/cargo/python/go/generic) and recommend relevant Vrooli scenarios based on detected stack
requirements.validation_method: Project types correctly identified and appropriate scenario recommendations provided

requirements.title: Version Tracking
requirements.description: Track Vrooli documentation versions per project and flag outdated integrations when Vrooli capabilities change
requirements.validation_method: Version mismatches detected and outdated projects flagged in UI

requirements.title: Bulk Operations
requirements.description: Support bulk update operations across multiple projects with progress reporting and error handling
requirements.validation_method: Bulk operations complete successfully with detailed progress and error reporting

requirements.title: Health Checks
requirements.description: Verify integration health by checking that documentation files still exist and contain expected content
requirements.validation_method: Health checks accurately detect missing or corrupted integration files

requirements.title: Project Categorization
requirements.description: Support tagging and categorizing projects with custom labels for organization and filtering
requirements.validation_method: Projects can be tagged, filtered by tags, and categories displayed in UI

requirements.title: Auto-update on New Scenarios
requirements.description: Automatically update project documentation when new Vrooli scenarios are added to the ecosystem

requirements.title: Dependency Visualization
requirements.description: Display project dependency graph showing relationships between Vrooli-enabled projects

requirements.title: Custom Templates
requirements.description: Support custom documentation templates per project type for tailored integration guidance

requirements.title: Analytics
requirements.description: Track integration analytics including adoption rates, usage patterns, and scenario utilization
